BuildEventTrackingMetadata.description: Optional tracking metadata for analytics, errors, distribution, device, and usage context.

services.description: Enabled tracking sections (analytics, errors, distribution, devices, usage).

TeamIdHeader.name: x-team-id
TeamIdHeader.description: Active team context. Required for team-scoped endpoints.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.description: Access token for websocket auth (browser fallback when Authorization header cannot be set).

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Team context for websocket auth (browser fallback when x-team-id header cannot be set).

post.description: Creates a personal team if the user has no team membership yet. The first registered user is marked as a super user.
Ensures a personal team exists for first-time logins.
Creates a session and ensures a personal team exists for first-time logins. The first user is marked as a super user.

get.description: Returns build metadata with artifacts grouped by kind plus targets/app/version context.
Lists extracted icon images for build targets and includes inline data URLs.
Returns the extracted icon image for a target.

post.summary: Create or update feature flag override

post.description: iOS: extracts entitlements/provisioning profile and stores an entitlements artifact with distribution = adhoc | appstore | enterprise | none | broken. Returns 400 invalid_archive when the IPA/APK is not a valid zip archive.
Returns 400 invalid_archive when the IPA/APK is not a valid zip archive.

For iOS installs, the plist must include a prevalidated HTTPS download URL. The plist itself is not protected, so the IPA URL must be tokenized (local) or pre-signed (S3) and time-limited. Both plist and IPA download URLs require valid HTTPS certificates. For Android AABs, use bundletool with a device spec (ABI, density, language, sdkVersion) to generate device-specific APK sets and enforce the 4 GB compressed APK-set limit.
Team admin/owner only. Token returned once.

get.description: Storage totals, downloads this month, and uploads in the current billing cycle for the active team.
